thread.title: J.K. Rowling Debunks Harry Potter Fans' 'False' Theories
thread.title_full: J.K. Rowling Debunks Harry Potter Fans' 'False' Theories

title: J.K. Rowling Debunks Harry Potter Fans' 'False' Theories
text:
Photos J K Rowling | File AP 
MELBOURNE: Slamming all the false speculations, J.K. Rowling has clarified that her fans’ evidence about Ronald Weasley being a time travelling Dumbledore and Draco Malfoy being a werewolf is false. 
The British novelist took to twitter clarifying that Hogwarts’ headmaster Albus Dumbledore will not travel in time to help Potter, adding “Draco definitely isn’t a werewolf”, News.com.au reported. 
The 50-year-old novelist revealed that Draco Malfoy and Severus Snape are just wizards, but choose not to spill anything about Snape’s scent.
